nodes.text: Saigok was a game similar to dejarik. It was played by Lando Calrissian, Chewbacca, and Kaasha Bateen on Taka Jamoreesa's ZV-9 freighter Vermillion during 7 ABY as they traveled to Substation Grimdock, a New Republic prison complex. Bateen was skilled at the game, calling it "badass dejarik."
